roleset.name: telling, alerting
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, notify.01. Corresponds to VNcls advise-37.9, tell-37.2.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: He has decided to receive his notification of the nomination at Oyster Bay, which probably will be made to him early in July.

example.name: args 2 as complement clause
example.text: Fred Goldman complained of the time lapse in his notification that his son was killed the previous evening.
example.arg: that his son was killed the previous evening

example.name: just arg1
example.text: If you have evidence that he assaults his own kids , I 'd be considering a chold protection notification .
example.note: Here, "chold protection" is understood as "child protective services", who are the people being notified, hence arg1.
